title: Bloomberg Markets: Draghi Mum on Monetary Policy
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Draghi Mum on Monetary Policy
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alessandro Speciale ECB Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing a recap of European Central Bank President Mario Draghi's speech from the Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City’s annual summit in Jackson Hole, Wyoming. Draghi made no direct comments about ECB monetary policy deliberations or euro exchange rate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
